data.eml:eml: Catalogue of the herbarium specimens collected from Discovery Bay and Runaway Bay, Jamaica, West Indies, 1958-1999.

This is a catalogue of the terrestrial plants collected by the University of the West Indies from Discovery Bay and Runaway Bay in the parish of St. Ann, Jamaica, West Indies, during the period 1958 to 1999. It includes 201 plant species representing 54 families that were collected and identified by D. L. Kelly, A. C. Podzorski, G. Ellison and J. H. Palmer. These herbarium specimens form part of the University of the West Indies and the Institute of Jamaica online virtual herbarium collection (www.jamaicavirtualherbarium.com).
